en.title: Great News! Successful Heart Operation For 4 Month Old Indonesian Baby Girl!
en.content:
WORDS OF APPRECIATION. 

The parents of Ny. Rina, the 4 month old baby girl suffering from VSD (Ventricular Septal Defect) whereby a hole exists between the left & right ventricle of her heart at birth, thank FusionExcel International Sdn Bhd for its generous donation of RP 53,800,000 (RM 18,000) to enable their child to go through a heart surgery. 

Without this donation they would not be able to afford the operation as they earn merely about RP 1,000,000 (RM 320.00) a month. With the success of this operation, the 4 months old baby girl's life is saved and she is able to continue to live a normal life. 

The parents also thank Dr. Jusof Rachmat, the cardiac surgeon who meticulously performed the operation successfully for about 3 to 4 hours on 12th May 2009. The child is recovering well from the surgery and is home. 

The donation of RP 53.8 million was handled over by Mr. Paul Ting, CEO of FusionExcel International on 02nd May 2009 at the Jakarta Achievers' Recognition Dinner Event. 

FusionExcel International would like to thank Rotary International, through their "Gift Of Life" program for the opportunity to work together in this charity project. 



4 month old Ny Rina who suffers from Ventricular Septal Defect. 2 Days After the Successful Operation.
Ny Rina is Recovering Well. Ny Rina Feels More Comfortable.
FE’s PD Stanley Liew, Surgeon Dr Jusof Rachmat 
and Rotarian Mark Wong Visiting Ny Rina.
